message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $16,000.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $16,000 is above my budget.  I'd be interested in buying if you were willing to come down to $10,500.  This is the highest I'm able to go.

I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $10,500 is quite a bit lower than I'm hoping for. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? I'm confident you'll find it's a fair price for the value this product offers.

Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,500. This is a fair price considering the value I place on the product and the savings it would bring me.
